record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - May 12, 2008)

[Page: S4033]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, first, I wish to ask unanimous consent that Julia Ann Frudden and Shannon Sanders of my staff be granted floor privileges for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the floor privileges be extended to Paul Hazlehurst and Brian Kelliher, two detailees of my staff, for the remainder of the 110th Congress.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
